Buttigieg and Warren tie. Coin toss about to happen pic.twitter.com/fJVqDDN5pS â€” John Pemble (@johnpemble) February 4, 2020 Final count: Pete - 44Biden - 31Bernie - 31Amy - 29 Pete picks up most people from 1st to 2nd round. Amy back from the dead. Biden and Bernie now settling tie through ancient democratic practice of a coin flip. pic.twitter.com/Nwz2feXF4t â€” Eric Lach (@ericlach) February 4, 2020 This is nothing new â€” in 2016, Hillary Clinton won all six of her Iowa caucus coin tosses.
